entry.def: If a group of people give a handclap, they clap their hands.

means.word_mean: 1. a clap of the hands to indicate approval

auth_sentence.content: In almost an ironic sense, like a slow handclap after a bad joke.

auth_sentence.content: From its synth and guitar intro to handclap-heavy breakdown, the single was class writ large.

auth_sentence.content: It rides a steady handclap and a bongo sound, less syncopated than Diwali but faster, inching toward disco.
